ceo.name: Ron M. Vachris
ceo.background: Started as forklift driver in 1982 at Price Club while studying business at Glendale Community College. 40+ years at company, Greek American background, Staten Island born 1965
ceo.track_record: Only third CEO in Costco history. Rose through operations chief, merchandising chief, real estate head. Named EVP merchandising & COO in 2016, President & COO in 2022. Hands-off leadership style trusting employee innovation

cfo.name: Gary Millerchip
cfo.background: Former CFO of Kroger (2019-2024), extensive retail and finance experience. Succeeded Richard Galanti who retired after 40-year tenure (1984-2024) with Stanford MBA

key_executives.name: Teresa Jones
key_executives.role: EVP, COO - Global Depots and Traffic

recent_changes.change: Ron Vachris became CEO, succeeding Craig Jelinek
Gary Millerchip became CFO, Richard Galanti to advisory role
Gina Raimondo nominated to Board (former Commerce Secretary)
Board refreshment: 5 new independent directors added, 10 ceased service since 2014

compensation_highlights: CEO Vachris 2025: $1.18M salary + $600K bonus + $12.04M stock awards = $13.9M total. Former CFO Galanti: $917K salary + $164K bonus + $5.37M stock. Equity-heavy structure with performance-based RSUs
governance_notes: Strong institutional ownership (69-72%). Independent director majority. Nominating committee met 6x in FY2025. Board met 4x with 100% attendance. Annual meeting Jan 15, 2026 for 10 director elections
